java/liquibase/exception/ValidationFailedException.java

00001 package liquibase.exception;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.ChangeSet;
00004 import liquibase.parser.visitor.ValidatingVisitor;
00005 import liquibase.preconditions.FailedPrecondition;
00006 import liquibase.util.StreamUtil;
00007 
00008 import java.io.PrintStream;
00009 import java.util.List;
00010 import java.util.Set;
00011 
00012 public class ValidationFailedException extends MigrationFailedException {
00013 
00014     private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
00015     
00016     private List<ChangeSet> invalidMD5Sums;
00017     private List<FailedPrecondition> failedPreconditions;
00018     private Set<ChangeSet> duplicateChangeSets;
00019     private List<SetupException> setupExceptions;
00020 
00021     public ValidationFailedException(ValidatingVisitor changeLogHandler) {
00022         this.invalidMD5Sums = changeLogHandler.getInvalidMD5Sums();
00023         this.failedPreconditions = changeLogHandler.getFailedPreconditions();
00024         this.duplicateChangeSets = changeLogHandler.getDuplicateChangeSets();
00025         this.setupExceptions = changeLogHandler.getSetupExceptions();
00026         
00027     }
00028 
00029 
00030     public String getMessage() {
00031         StringBuffer message = new StringBuffer();
00032         message.append("Validation Failed:").append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00033         if (invalidMD5Sums.size() > 0) {
00034             message.append("     ").append(invalidMD5Sums.size()).append(" change sets failed MD5Sum Check").append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00035             for (int i=0; i< invalidMD5Sums.size(); i++) {
00036                 if (i > 25) {
00037                     break;
00038                 }
00039                 ChangeSet invalid = invalidMD5Sums.get(i);
00040                 message.append("          ").append(invalid.toString(true));
00041                 message.append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00042             }
00043         }
00044         if (failedPreconditions.size() > 0) {
00045             message.append("     ").append(failedPreconditions.size()).append(" preconditions failed").append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00046             for (FailedPrecondition invalid : failedPreconditions) {
00047                 message.append("     ").append(invalid.toString());
00048                 message.append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00049             }
00050         }
00051         if (duplicateChangeSets.size() > 0) {
00052             message.append("     ").append(duplicateChangeSets.size()).append(" change sets had duplicate identifiers").append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00053             for (ChangeSet invalid : duplicateChangeSets) {
00054                 message.append("          ").append(invalid.toString(false));
00055                 message.append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00056             }
00057         }
00058         if(setupExceptions.size() >0){
00059             message.append("     ").append(setupExceptions.size()).append(" changes have failures").append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00060             for (SetupException invalid : setupExceptions) {
00061                 message.append("          ").append(invalid.toString());
00062                 message.append(StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());                
00063             }
00064         }
00065         
00066         return message.toString();
00067     }
00068 
00069     public List<ChangeSet> getInvalidMD5Sums() {
00070         return invalidMD5Sums;
00071     }
00072 
00073     public void printDescriptiveError(PrintStream out) {
00074         out.println("Validation Error: ");
00075         if (invalidMD5Sums.size() > 0) {
00076             out.println("     "+invalidMD5Sums.size()+" change sets have changed since they were ran against the database");
00077             for (ChangeSet changeSet : invalidMD5Sums) {
00078                 out.println("          "+changeSet.toString(false));
00079             }
00080         }
00081 
00082         if (failedPreconditions.size() > 0) {
00083             out.println("     "+failedPreconditions.size()+" preconditions failed");
00084             for (FailedPrecondition failedPrecondition : failedPreconditions) {
00085                 out.println("          "+failedPrecondition.toString());
00086             }
00087         }
00088 
00089         if (duplicateChangeSets.size() > 0) {
00090             out.println("     "+duplicateChangeSets.size()+" change sets had duplicate identifiers");
00091             for (ChangeSet duplicate : duplicateChangeSets) {
00092                 out.println("          "+duplicate.toString(false));
00093             }
00094         }
00095         
00096         if(setupExceptions.size() >0) {
00097             out.println("     "+setupExceptions.size()+" changes had errors");
00098             for (SetupException setupEx : setupExceptions) {
00099                 out.println("          "+setupEx.getMessage());
00100             }
00101         }
00102     }
00103 }
